TopicTitle: Ability to remove comments from spaceport or craft release threads

Articles.Content:
As the title says I suggest the ability for the thread creator to remove comments (or tag them for a mod to look at and remove) from craft/mod release threads or the spaceport that advertise other mods/craft or are off topic...

Either a direct ability or a way to select a few comments and flag them for a mod to check. As it is you must select each one individually and most importantly this is not a feature on the spaceport.

For example recently I released a craft and the only comments were these :

"You need to see nassaults operation skybox short film on YouTube. This reminds me of that video in every way." After watching the video, I saw it had no connection to my craft at all and was only an advert.

"Sorry to break it to you,but, mulbin has allready made a STOCK apollo,complete with expiriments and rover,and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s found here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28073-Accurate-Apollo-Replica-Munbug-X-Saturn-V-CSM-Lander-Buggy-and-A-L-S-E-P" another advert for another craft.

I would mostly like the ability to remove comments like this that are off topic on the spaceport.

Even in the thread, after asking for comments on my craft I got

"Well, my only comment is that I'm very close to releasing my own version of the same thing, only 100% stock... " Another advert

and

"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDNMWQJlDto feels like Holst's Jolly Jupiter theme. Even though this is also another unoriginal piece, it's just a cover of a pre-existing song by MacLeod. I think it would be a great Jool song, edited to feel more spacey, and without the dramtic part in the middle." what has that to do with my Apollo replica?

The ONLY comments I got on topic from the spaceport and thread COMBINED were "I like how you incorporated science into the CSM. Also, are those antennas going all the way around? " Thank you GusTurbo.

and

"Can I bring this back on topic?

Hi John FX,

I havent downloaded your rocket yet so this is just going by the pics...*snip*" Thank you MajorJim

This is ruining my forum and spaceport experience and I would like the tools to stop it.
